name: Lucky Number
text: You are able to tweak tiny variables affecting a creature’s immediate future in order to grant the target a bit of luck at the right time. Roll a d20; once during the duration of lucky number, when the target creature rolls that result (regardless of what type of dice the target rolls), the creature has the option to either reroll the result or add a +2 luck bonus to the result. The creature must decide to use this ability before the success or failure of the original roll is known. A creature can have only one lucky number at a time. If lucky number is cast on a creature already affected by that spell, the new number replaces the previous one.
duration_zh: 24小时, 或 直至能量发散
text_zh: 你可以对一个生物短期内的未来施以微调，让它在恰当时机获得好运。投掷一个d20。在法术的持续时间内限一次，只要目标生物掷骰结果为该数字（不论他丢的是多少面骰），这个生物就可以选择重投检定或在该检定结果上获得+2幸运加值。该生物必须在知晓初始掷骰成功与否前选择使用本能力。一个生物同时只能拥有一个幸运数字的法术效果。若一个具有此法术效果的生物再次被施展幸运数字，新的幸运数字法术将取代旧的。
